body:
Failure of fixed high expansion foam system to extinguish fire on board the passenger ferry Oscar Wilde

  
[ASSET_TAG](#ASSET0) (1,813.40 kb) 

An Investigation report was later produced for this accident which can be viewed on this website:  
[Read Investigation report](http://maib.gov.uk/publications/investigation_reports/2011/oscar_wilde.cfm)
